title: 3.2 Master Challenge 2
question:
Add a new slide to the presentation created in Challenge 1 and add shapes or icons to the slides as shown below.
1. Add animation to the shapes and icons.
2. Add a time delay in a sequence to make the images appear one after the other.
3. Add three more slides for the triangle, square, and rectangle shapes.
4. Add a transition on a slide and morph the transition to the other slides.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
